alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Salt Lake...southeastern Davis and western Summit Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Salt Lake, or near Murray, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Bountiful, Taylorsville, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Summit Park, Emigration Canyon, Millcreek, Mount Olympus, Mill Creek Canyon, East Millcreek, Cottonwood West, Canyon Rim, Sugarhouse, Parleys Summit and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 301 and 309. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 119 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
